Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class WareHouseDepotsExt

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.constant.model.WareHouseDepots
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.WareHouseDepotsExt
public class WareHouseDepotsExt
extends WareHouseDepots
WareHouseDepotsExt class. Extends WareHouseDepots. Manage the warehouse depots and its resources.

  • Method Details

    • addResource

      public void addResource​(NumberOfResources input) throws UnableToFillException
      This method add the resources to all the shelf if it found them.
      Parameters:
      input - of type NumberOfResources: the resources that has to be added.
      Throws:
      UnableToFillException - the unable to fill exception

    • subResource

      public void subResource​(NumberOfResources required) throws OutOfResourcesException
      This method subtracted the resources from all the shelf if it found them.
      Parameters:
      required - of type NumberOfResources: the resources that has to be subtracted.
      Throws:
      OutOfResourcesException - the out of resources exception

    • addExtraShelf

      public void addExtraShelf​(Shelf shelf)
      This method is called by ability Deposit, and can be called 2 times. Add an extra shelf to WareHouseDepots.
      Parameters:
      shelf - of type Shelf: the shelf to add.

    • CleanShelf

      public void CleanShelf()
      This method clean all the shelf from their items (the number is set to zero and the type is cancelled). For the extra shelf the type is preserved.

    • check_NumberOfResources_Integrity_for_WareHouseDepots

      private boolean check_NumberOfResources_Integrity_for_WareHouseDepots​(NumberOfResources input)
      This method check that the number of resources is not asking to add 4 different types of resources
      Parameters:
      input - of type NumberOfResources: the new resources.
      Returns:
      True if the number of resource's type to add is minor than 4. Otherwise False.

    • fill_correctly

      private void fill_correctly​(NumberOfResources my_resources) throws UnableToFillException
      This method fills shelves according to the game's rules. If it can't throws an exception and leaves everything as before.
      Parameters:
      my_resources - of type NumberOfResources:
      Throws:
      UnableToFillException
